Actions.Name: Add a child exhibitor to the specified booth
Actions.Description: When adding a child exhibitor, the child exhibitor must already exist

Actions.Name: Change the number of the specified booth
Actions.Description: Changes the number of the specified booth in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Remove a single booth class from the specified booth
Actions.Description: Removes a single booth class from the specified booth in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Reset the display on drawing override for the specified booth
Actions.Description: Resets the display on drawing override for the specified booth.

Actions.Name: Combine the specified booths into a new booth
Actions.Description: Combines the specified booths into a new booth in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Delete the specified booths
Actions.Description: Deletes the specified booths in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Get Specific Booth
Actions.Description: Returns the specified booth.

Actions.Name: Get All Available Booths
Actions.Description: Returns a collection of all available booths in the supplied event

Actions.Name: Get All Booths
Actions.Description: Returns an array of all booths in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Get All Rented Booths
Actions.Description: Returns a collection of all rented booths in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Holds the specified booth
Actions.Description: EXPOCAD allows for a booth to be placed on hold to either an existing Exhibitor (by Id) or to a temporary Exhibitor (by Name). Choose one parameter or the other -  'ExhibitorId' or 'ExhibitorName'. If both paramerters are supplied, the hold will default to the Exhibitor ID.

Actions.Name: Convert Held booth to Rented
Actions.Description: Rents the specified held booth to the held exhibitor in the supplied event. This operation will fail if the booth is currently held to a temporary exhibitor.

Actions.Name: Remove a child exhibitor from the specified booth
Actions.Description: Removes a child exhibitor from the specified booth in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Rent a Booth
Actions.Description: Rents the specified booth in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Convert Rented booth to Hold
Actions.Description: Converts the specified rented booth to a booth on hold to the same exhibitor in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Apply a single booth class to the specified booth
Actions.Description: Applys a single booth class to the specified booth in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Override the display on drawing property for the specified booth
Actions.Description: Overrides the display on drawing property for the specified booth.

Actions.Name: Uncombine the specified booth
Actions.Description: Uncombines the specified booth in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Undelete the specified booths
Actions.Description: Undeletes the specified booths in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Unholds the specified booth
Actions.Description: Unholds the specified booth in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Unrent a Booth
Actions.Description: Unrents the specified booth in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Add a new booth class
Actions.Description: Adds a new booth class to the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Delete a booth class
Actions.Description: Deletes a booth class in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Return the specified booth class
Actions.Description: Returns the specified booth class.

Actions.Name: Return a collection of all booth classes
Actions.Description: Returns a collection of all booth classes in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Update the specified booth class
Actions.Description: Updates the specified booth class.

Actions.Name: Get All Events
Actions.Description: Returns a collection of registered events.

Actions.Name: Get Event Information
Actions.Description: Returns basic information about the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Get Event Statistics
Actions.Description: Returns basic statistics describing the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Add a new exhibitor
Actions.Description: Adds a new exhibitor to the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Delete an exhibitor
Actions.Description: Deletes an exhibitor in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Get an Exhibitor
Actions.Description: Returns the specified exhibitor.

Actions.Name: Get All Exhibitors
Actions.Description: Returns a collection of all exhibitors in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Update an exhibitor
Actions.Description: Updates an exhibitor in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Get financial information for the specified booth
Actions.Description: Returns financial information for the specified booth.

Actions.Name: Returns all invoices in supplied event
Actions.Description: Returns all invoices in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Get a collection of transactions
Actions.Description:
Parameters startDate and endDate allow you to filter by a date range.
If you do decide to filter by a range, you must supply at least one valid date.
Valid dates are in the format of: YYYY-MM-DD

Actions.Name: Get a list of all assigned request items
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all assigned request items. If any parameter is omitted, that filter will not be applied.

Actions.Name: Get details of a single invoice
Actions.Description: Gets details of a single invoice Either invoiceNo or exhibtitorId is required.

Actions.Name: Get a list of payments in the Expocad Event
Actions.Description: Returns list of payments in the Expocad Event.For Non-Credit Card Payments, The Check Number is returned in the CCLast4 field.

Actions.Name: Get the master list of payment types
Actions.Description: Returns the master list of payment types.

Actions.Name: Returns the master list of requestable items
Actions.Description: Will return items that match either the glCode or the transactionCode. For TotalNumberAvailable, 0 = Unlimited

Actions.Name: Get a collection of all pavilions
Actions.Description: Returns a collection of all pavilions in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Add a new rate plan
Actions.Description: Adds a new rate plan to the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Get a collection of all rate plans
Actions.Description: Returns a collection of all rate plans in the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Get the currently set default rate plan
Actions.Description: Returns the currently set default rate plan from the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Set the default rate plan
Actions.Description: Sets the default rate plan for the supplied event.

Actions.Name: Get a collection of all showinshows
Actions.Description: Returns a collection of all showinshows in the supplied event.
